description: This file contains automated end-to-end tests for keyboard interactions in a web application, specifically testing node addition, deletion, and keyboard shortcuts overlay.

methods.name: test('keyboard add node (N) and delete selection (Del)', async ({ page }) => {...})

methods.name: test('shortcuts overlay lists undo/redo indicating keyboard support', async ({ page }) => {...})
methods.description: Verifies that the shortcuts overlay displays undo and redo options, indicating keyboard support.
